Click the following link to watch video: https://share.newscasts.refinitiv.com/link?entryId=1_yc9ewknb&referenceId=1_yc9ewknb&pageId=RefinitivNewscasts
Source: Reuters

Description: Vaccine optimism is replaced with caution ahead of the Fed and as more countries announced new COVID-19 restrictions to curb the spread of the Omicron coronavirus variant. Italy fines Amazon a record $1.3 bln dollars for the alleged abuse of market dominance.
Short Link: https://refini.tv/3GnQyiu
